trans-unit.source: Replaces the standard common language runtime (CLR) free-threaded marshaler with the standard OLE STA marshaler.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o padrão common language runtime (CLR) free-thread marshaler com marshaler STA OLE padrão.

trans-unit.source: The StandardOleMarshalObject class prevents calls made into a hosting object by OLE from entering threads other than the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: A classe StandardOleMarshalObject impede que as chamadas feitas em um objeto de hospedagem pelo OLE insiram threads que não seja o thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You should derive your class from the StandardOleMarshalObject class to gain this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar sua classe da classe StandardOleMarshalObject para obter essa funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You should derive your class from the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject> class-.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de classe a partir de <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject>classe-.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StandardOleMarshalObject>
